landing.bio: I basically work hard and get things done. I’m passionate about learning and that’s why I found my place in the software developing world, since it allows me to learn new things everyday, to use my problem solving and creative skills. Welcome to my profile.

experience.aboutWork: Development of internal software. My responsibilities include: Planning, designing and developing software that saves man hours and facilitates operations with the end of increasing profits and minimizing costs. Building Cloud Native RESTful API’s using the tech stack: Node.js, Express.js, npm, Docker, Kubernetes, and React.js. Scrum Methodology.

Built multiple projects: Websites, Web Applications, Email templates, Landing Pages. Using technologies such as: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, WordPress, PHP, Bootstrap, jQuery, Adobe suite, React, Angular, Nodejs.
Focused on Front-End Development mostly, worked on big companies projects including Capital Slack, FX Networks and Mission Foods.

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a software developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I like to go ski. During the warmer months here in Mendoza, I enjoy mountain biking, and kayaking.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.

awards.awardDetail: Highest GPA of my class 2019 Mendoza, Argentina UTN
